document.full_text: fifty-eight percent of americans think u.s. nuclear power plants are safe, while the public remains split over the need for more plants following japan's nuclear crisis, a gallup poll showed on monday.
document.title: most americans say u.s. nuclear plants safe: poll
lines_and_colors: fifty-eight percent of americans think u.s. nuclear power plants are safe, while the public remains split over the need for more plants following japan's nuclear crisis, a gallup poll showed on monday.
